ygData.subject: Re: Are high-lvl illusions good for combat?
ygData.msgSnippet: I know its unlikely but.... If i turn into a troll can i put on an all -classs troll piece of armour? ... From: Daniel Devorkin  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I know its unlikely but....

If i turn into a troll can i put on an all -classs troll piece of armour?

----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel Devorkin <devo@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 15, 1999 5:29 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Are high-lvl illusions good for combat?


> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> okay, so every illusion gives you certain abilities?
> like human gives you more exp in a battle?
> and stuff like that?
> if you know all the benefits, list them for the ones you know, this can
come
> in as a great list for certain times.
>
> Aeramus (Bristlebane)
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Rob Berryhill <racefan@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 3:15 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Are high-lvl illusions good for combat?
>
>
> > From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
> >
> > They are indeed fixed now.
> >
> > Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
> > Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
> >
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
> > > Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 1:48 PM
> > > To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> > > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Are high-lvl illusions good for combat?
> > >
> > >
> > > From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
> > >
> > > From what I understand, in one of the latest patches, the special
> > > abilities
> > > granted by the different illusion spells were removed
> > > unintentionally. Does
> > > anyone know if they have put those back in yet?
> > >
> > > Also, has anyone else noticed a decrease in your pet's hp as of late?
> >
> >
